title: RiskCom
text: RiskCom package containing tools help communicating risk. Previous packages less customisable required use specific icon libraries. RiskCom flexible allows images files internet URLs used, also small built-library custom made icons.

title: RiskCom
text: Waffle plots useful showing percentages, icon representing one percent. RiskCom contains icons can used. Images files internet URL can also used.

title: RiskCom
text: easy create simple waffle plots. , small built-RiskCom library used. use local image image internet, icon_lib option can set file internet.
code: icons = c("happy", "neutral", "sad") # Choose icons legend = c("Happy", "Neutral", "Sad") # Name for the icons percentages = c(35, 45, 20) # Percentage of each icon waffles(icons, legend, percentages, icon_lib="RiskCom") # The waffle plot function

title: RiskCom
text: double waffle plot can used add extra dimension waffle plots. example shows many people disease many people happy.
code: icons1 = c("person", "person_grey") icons2 = c("happy", "neutral", "sad") legend1 = c("No disease", "Disease") legend2 = c("Happy", "Neutral", "Sad") percentages = c(70,9,1, 3, 5, 12) waffles(icons=icons1, legend=legend1, percentages,         icons2=icons2, legend2=legend2, icon_size=0.09) #> Scale for y is already present. #> Adding another scale for y, which will replace the existing scale.

what: ninN: Showing n in N patients with a disease or condition
title: RiskCom
text: can help visually demonstrating statements “Two five people high cholesterol.” similar waffle plots, smaller scale.  , example, risk factor increased three five, show using additional argument. also show colours argument can used choose colour icons.
code: ninN(n=2, N=5, icon="person", plt_size=.8) ninN(n=2, N=5, icon="person", additional=1, plt_size=.8, colours = c("black", "blue", "lightgrey"))

title: RiskCom
text: Pie charts commonly used, can difficult read find difficult judge angles find easier judge straight line distances. alternative bar chart just use single line. barprob function can used .

title: Waffle plot creator — waffles
text: icons Vector icon paths legend Vector icon descriptions corresponding icons percentages Vector percentages icon (must sum 100) icon_lib Library fetch icons (One 'file', 'RiskCom', 'internet') icons2 Optional additional level icons legend2 Optional additional legends second icons export (Optional) File path name export icon_size Size main icons icon_size2 Size additional icons legend_size Size icon legends dir_size Direction size ('height' 'width') offset_x Offset additional icons offset_y Offset additional icons

title: Waffle plot creator — waffles
code: # Single waffle plot icons = c("happy",   "neutral",   "sad") legend = c("Happy", "Neutral", "Sad") percentages = c(35, 45, 20) waffles(icons, legend, percentages)   # Double waffle plot using icons from the internet # Icons2 can be different but the same are used here icons1 = c("person", "person_grey") icons2 = c("happy", "neutral", "sad") legend1 = c("No disease", "Disease") legend2 = c("Happy", "Neutral", "Sad") percentages = c(70,9,1, 3, 5, 12) waffles(icons=icons1, legend=legend1, percentages,         icons2=icons2, legend2=legend2) #> Scale for y is already present. #> Adding another scale for y, which will replace the existing scale.
